document.full_text: syrian forces shot dead six civilians in an attack on sunni districts in the mixed city of banias on saturday, rights campaigners said, raising sectarian tension in a country gripped by pro-democracy protests.
document.title: syria army attacks banias, raising sectarian tension
lines_and_colors: syrian forces shot dead six civilians in an attack on sunni districts in the mixed city of banias on saturday, rights campaigners said, raising sectarian tension in a country gripped by pro-democracy protests.
